patterns: is 30 mins of immersion good enough
is of immersion enough to become fluent
is of study good enough
is of immersion good enough
responses: For Japanese, we recommend being able to commit at least 2 hours of active immersion. We don't feel less than that will lead to satisfactory progress. However, you don't have to do this right out the gate. You can slowly work up to this number over a few months.

patterns: Why should I learn Japanese
responses: Motivations to learn a language are personal. You should have a reason before coming to use. We will be waiting once you figure it out.
